trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Hudson
There were no other sightings in Hudson on or around July 7th 2013
Summary: Flew in a straight line, saw numerous black helicopters in the following days.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking my dog,out at 1900. Scanning the cosmos the object in question caught my eye. It flew in a straight,line, west to east. It disappeared behind some trees blocking my view;could not pursuemduemto pond. Said object looked very low, made no,sound, and had 4 bright white lights. It was cigar shaped, and moved,smoothly and quite fast. I watched it for 2 minutes; about the speed of a helicopter getting ready to land. Speaking of helicopters, I saw numerous black ones flying around the following week.
